doc.title: Misteriyata na Gela
doc.plot: In the heart of the Rhodope Mountain, there is a small village - Gela with a constant population of 98 people. It has become a symbol of the Bulgarian national spirit, dignity and honor over the last year. The documentary is based on the attempts of the team to reveal the secrets and riddles of this region and the mystery of a unique plant - the flower of Orpheus. While searching for the myth about this flower the team came to witness the personal life drama of the 7 principal characters in the film.
